properties.entry: SELECT I.USER_NO, I.TEAM_NO, I.USER_ID, I.USER_EMAIL, I.USER_NAME, I.USER_PHONE, I.USER_SNS, I.USER_BD, I.USER_ADDRESS, I.USER_GENDER , I.USER_NATION , I.USER_IMG_ORIGIN , I.USER_IMG_RENAME, I.USER_AUTHORITY , I.USER_ST, TO_CHAR(I.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(I.DELETE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS DELETE_DT, P.AGREE_ADDRESS, P.AGREE_EMAIL, P.AGREE_PHONE, (SELECT MAX(H.LOGIN_DT) FROM USER_HISTORY H WHERE H.USER_NO = I.USER_NO) AS LAST_LOGIN_DT FROM USER_INFO I JOIN USER_POLICY P ON (I.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) ORDER BY I.USER_NO ASC
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_AUTHORITY = ?, USER_ST = ?, FAIL_CNT = 0 WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_AUTHORITY = ?, USER_ST = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
